text: 300px Madame de Pompadour at her Tambour Frame is a 1753-64 painting by François-Hubert Drouais showing Madame de Pompadour embroidering. It is now in the National Gallery, London. ==External links== *http://www.nationalgallery.org.uk/paintings/francois-hubert-drouais-madame- de-pompadour-at-her-tambour-frame category:Collections of the National Gallery, London category:1764 paintings Pompadour Category:Cultural depictions of Madame de Pompadour Category:Women in art Category:Dogs in art
title: Madame de Pompadour at her Tambour Frame
